svg.content: <mxfile userAgent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_13_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) draw.io/8.0.6 Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Electron/1.7.5 Safari/537.36" version="8.4.6" editor="www.draw.io" type="device"><diagram id="7a6f75e5-e16f-4167-f591-0148f62e5c1d" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.span: 交易 3 的默克尔分支
